result.arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلدِّينَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡإِسۡلَٰمُۗ وَمَا ٱخۡتَلَفَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡعِلۡمُ بَغۡيَۢا بَيۡنَهُمۡۗ وَمَن يَكۡفُرۡ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
result.translation: 19. Diggah Yallih xaqul diini deqsittaah Yalli kicniih isi farmoytit edde Ruubem islaam diini kinni, kitab kah yontocowwime mari itta mawanna farmoytit Ruubiyyaa kee kitoobah oobiyyal islaam diinit culaanamih ixxiga keenih kak Amma itteek lakal Akke waytek Sittin fanal Ion kuxe waynan kee caddok taturuh, Yalli kay inkittinaanee kee kay dudda tascassee Astooti yangaddec marah, toysa diggah Yalli cisab sissikiih umaanek Abak Sugeenimil ken gaițele Akeeral.
